title: Health insurance policies and summary of benefits (SBC)
dataVerified: Policyholder name, dependents, coverage details, deductibles, copays, network providers
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake health insurance in employment verification and medical care. Domain binding verifies insurer. ACA Summary of Benefits and Coverage standardized format. Prevents coverage misrepresentation to providers. Multi-page SBC documents benefit from per-page verification. Critical for healthcare providers who verify insurance before providing expensive medical care.
